name: IOBufferMemoryDescriptor
desc: A memory buffer allocated in the caller's address space.

items.name: + Create
items.desc: Creates a new memory buffer descriptor object in the current process space.

items.name: - init
items.desc: Initializes the buffer memory descriptor object.

items.name: - free
items.desc: Performs any final cleanup for the memory buffer descriptor object.

items.name: - SetLength
items.desc: Changes the length of the memory buffer.

items.name: - GetAddressRange
items.desc: Returns the address and length of the memory buffer.
